snippet.title: Mystic Vale Trailer
snippet.description:
Cleanse the cursed lands and bring peace to the Valley of Life in this deck-building game from Nomad Games and AEG. Using the innovative Card Crafting System, designed by John D. Clair, Mystic Vale sees you take on the role of a druidic clan intent on rescuing spirits and healing the land.

With a deck of only 20 cards, you must purchase Advancements which are slotted onto your cards to upgrade them, making the cards more powerful as you progress. 
Steam version - 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/908070/Mystic_Vale/

iOS and Android coming soon!
